getClassPool

protected ClassPool getClassPool(String className)
Returns a Javassist ClassPool that is appropriate for the supplied class name.

The default implementation of this method ignores the className parameter and returns the return value of ClassPool.getDefault(). For nearly all cases, this is the correct behavior and this method should not be overridden.

If overrides of this method opt to return null, the return value of ClassPool.getDefault() will be used internally instead.

Parameters:
className - the class name for which the returned ClassPool might be appropriate; may be null and may safely be ignored; provided for contextual information only
Returns:
a ClassPool instance, or null
See Also:
ClassPool, ClassPool.getDefault()

installXmlJavaTypeAdapters

private final boolean installXmlJavaTypeAdapters(CtClass packageInfoCtClass)
                                          throws NotFoundException
Installs an XmlJavaTypeAdapters annotation on the supplied CtClass, which must represent package-info.class.

Parameters:
packageInfoCtClass - the result of calling, e.g., ClassPool.get(this.getPackage() + "package-info"); must not be null
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException
NotFoundException

installXmlJavaTypeAdapters

private final boolean installXmlJavaTypeAdapters(Annotation adaptersAnnotation,
                                                 ConstPool constantPool)
                                          throws NotFoundException
Given a Javassist Annotation representing the XmlJavaTypeAdapters annotation, does whatever is necessary to make such an Annotation contain an array of AnnotationMemberValue objects, each of which represents an XmlJavaTypeAdapter annotation that has been specified in accordance with the rules represented by the return value of the getBindings() method.

Parameters:
adaptersAnnotation - a non-null Javassist Annotation representation of the XmlJavaTypeAdapters annotation
constantPool - a ConstPool instance for use in constructing new Annotation instances; Javassist documentation does not specify whether null is a permitted value or not
Throws:
NotFoundException - in extremely rare situations when a JDK class cannot be located, usually due to ClassLoader problems

newXmlJavaTypeAdapter

private final Annotation newXmlJavaTypeAdapter(ConstPool constantPool,
                                               String typeName)
                                        throws NotFoundException
Throws:
NotFoundException

setXmlAdapter

private static final boolean setXmlAdapter(Annotation adapterAnnotation,
                                           String adapterClassName)

getExistingXmlJavaTypeAdapters

private static final Map<String,Annotation> getExistingXmlJavaTypeAdapters(ArrayMemberValue adaptersHolder)
A narrow-purpose helper method that accepts an ArrayMemberValue parameter whose value is (semantically) the return value of the XmlJavaTypeAdapters.value() annotation attribute, and returns a Map of Annotation objects representing XmlJavaTypeAdapter annotations indexed by the types that each of them governs.

This method never returns null.

Parameters:
adaptersHolder - the ArrayMemberValue that resulted from calling Annotation#getMemberValue("value") on an Annotation that is Javassist's representation of the XmlJavaTypeAdapters annotation. This parameter may be null.
Returns:
a Map of Annotation objects representing XmlJavaTypeAdapter annotations indexed by the types that each of them governs; never null
